    Viktor Zamaraev

    Lecturer
    Department of Computer Science
    University of Liverpool

    Contact

    Email

    Hello! My name is Viktor Zamaraev

    2019 – present Lecturer at the Department of Computer Science of University of Liverpool.
    2017 – 2019 Research Associate at the Department of Computer Science of Durham University.
    2014 – 2017 Research Fellow at the Mathematics Institute of the University of Warwick.
    2011 – 2014 Researcher at Laboratory of Algorithms and Technologies for Networks Analysis.
    2013 – 2014 Associate professor at Higher School of Economics, Nizhni Novgorod.
    2012 – 2014 Assistant professor at Lobachevsky State University of Nizhni Novgorod.
    2011 – 2013 Lecturer at Higher School of Economics, Nizhni Novgorod.
    2009 – 2012 Graduate student at Lobachevsky State University of Nizhni Novgorod, Departament of Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics (Ph.D. in Theoretical Computer Science).
    2009, (Jan – Nov) Software designer at Auslogics Software.
    2003 – 2009 Student at Lobachevsky State University of Nizhni Novgorod, Departament of Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics (M.Sc. in Applied Mathematics).
    2007 – 2008 Research intern at Intel, Nizhni Novgorod.
    2004 – 2007 Software designer at Mera, Nizhni Novgorod.
    2002 – 2003 School №181, Nizhni Novgorod.
    1998 – 2002 School № 89, Odessa.
    Dec 30, 1985 Born in Odessa.
